version_description: This update contains various bug fixes and tweaks to keep Bob sneaking smoothly!
This update contains various bug fixes and tweaks to keep Bob sneaking smoothly!

- Running low on coins? Try the new Money Pants suit on for size! Not only does the Money Pants suit net you up to 200% more coins in every level, it also removes all ads… forever! But watch out! Because Money Pants Bob has more riches than he knows what

- Running low on coins? Try the new Money Pants suit on for size! Not only does the Money Pants suit net you up to 200% more coins in every level, it also removes all ads… forever! But watch out! Because Money Pants Bob has more riches than he knows what

- Play Robbery Bob 2 in your language! Added Indonesian language support.
- Various bug fixes and improvements.
Thank you for playing Robbery Bob! We are constantly working on improving the game. Download the latest version to get access to new features, optimizations and bug fixes.

- Robbery Bob: Double Trouble now takes up less space on your device, so you can download it, update it and get back to sneaking faster than ever, even over mobile networks!

- Squished some bugs and made some tweaks.
